Name: Maçã Cocktail
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of apple slice & mint sprig.
Review: Subtle combination of cachaça, fresh lime, apple juice and elderflower.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2007 by Jamie Terrell, New York, USA while he was working for Sagatiba. Maçã means apple in Portuguese.
Nutrition: One serving of Maçã Cocktail contains 192 calories
